data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in South Khorasan, Iran by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of South Khorasan, Iran
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in South Khorasan, Iran and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in South Khorasan, Iran be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in South Khorasan, Iran to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Pashtun, Southern people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Pashtun, Southern people know you.
Father, encourage your church in South Khorasan that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of South Khorasan that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of South Khorasan, Iran.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
